member.name: T:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation
member.summary: Implementation for Calendars

member.name: P:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.AccountName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the account to use for creating/editing calendars. Defaults to application package label.

member.name: P:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.OwnerAccount
member.summary: Gets or sets the owner account to use for creating/editing calendars. Defaults to application package label.

member.name: M:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.GetCalendarsAsync
member.summary: Gets a list of all calendars on the device.

member.name: M:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.GetCalendarByIdAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a single calendar by platform-specific ID.
member.returns: The corresponding calendar, or null if not found

member.name: M:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.GetEventsAsync(Plugin.Calendars.Abstractions.Calendar,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets all events for a calendar within the specified time range.
member.exception: Calendar does not exist on device

member.name: M:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.GetEventByIdAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a single calendar event by platform-specific ID.
member.returns: The corresponding calendar event, or null if not found

member.name: M:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.AddOrUpdateCalendarAsync(Plugin.Calendars.Abstractions.Calendar)
member.summary: Creates a new calendar or updates the name and color of an existing one.
member.exception: Calendar does not exist on device or is read-only

member.name: M:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.AddOrUpdateEventAsync(Plugin.Calendars.Abstractions.Calendar,Plugin.Calendars.Abstractions.CalendarEvent)
member.summary: Add new event to a calendar or update an existing event.
member.exception: Calendar is not specified, does not exist on device, or is read-only

member.name: M:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.AddEventReminderAsync(Plugin.Calendars.Abstractions.CalendarEvent,Plugin.Calendars.Abstractions.CalendarEventReminder)
member.summary: Adds an event reminder to specified calendar event
member.param: Event to add the reminder to
member.exception: Calendar event is not created or not valid

member.name: M:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.DeleteCalendarAsync(Plugin.Calendars.Abstractions.Calendar)
member.summary: Removes a calendar and all its events from the system.

member.name: M:Plugin.Calendars.CalendarsImplementation.DeleteEventAsync(Plugin.Calendars.Abstractions.Calendar,Plugin.Calendars.Abstractions.CalendarEvent)
member.summary: Removes an event from the specified calendar.
